scripts.build: npm i && npx tsc && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/styles.css dist/ && cp -r src/assets dist/assets && cp src/favicon.ico dist/ && cp -r public dist/public
scripts.local: rm -rf dist && npm i && npx tsc && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/styles.css dist/ && cp -r src/assets dist/assets && cp src/favicon.ico dist/ && cp -r public dist/public && npx http-server dist
